item.title: Amazon casse le prix de ce chargeur Belkin 2-en-1 (50W) avec plus de 40% de remise
item.description: Voilà un accessoire indispensable à prix mini avec le Belkin BoostCharge 50 W intégrant un double port USB-C, qui est actuellement à -43 % sur Amazon.

item.title: LG’s C5 TV and Anker’s powerful power bank are this week’s best deals
item.description: It’s the first weekend of February, which can only mean one thing: The Super Bowl (or “Benito Bowl,” if you’re mainly tuning in for the Bad Bunny-led halftime show) is upon us. The game is Sunday, February 8th, at 6:30PM ET on Peacock, NFL Plus, and on live services that include NBC. With that out […]

item.title: I’ve used the DXRacer Martian Pro for three months and don’t want to sit in another gaming chair ever again
item.description: The DXRacer Martian Pro is a tech-filled gaming chair that offers worthwhile comfort upgrades.

item.title: How to watch the 2026 Super Bowl on NBC: Patriots vs. Seahawks channel, where to stream, start time, and more
item.description:
The New England Patriots are headed to the 2026 Super Bowl. (Lauren Leigh Bacho via Getty Images)
Lauren Leigh Bacho via Getty Images
The countdown is on, and Super Bowl LX, between the New England Patriots and Seattle Seahawks, is nearly here. This weekend, the Big Game will be held at Levi's Stadium in Santa Clara, CA. The NFL Championship Game kicks off at 6:30PM ET this Sunday, Feb. 8. Pre-game coverage starts at 12PM ET. Like all other Sunday Night Football games this season, the Super Bowl will be broadcast on NBC, and will stream live on Peacock. Here's everything you need ...

item.title: Warner Bros. Magically Morphs ‘Clayface’ and ‘Practical Magic 2’ Dates
item.description: September ain't big enough for two big movies, so WB's decided to leave 'Practical Magic 2' while 'Clayface' gets Halloween.

item.title: The second-gen AirTags are a scatterbrain’s best friend
item.description: In a somewhat controversial Vergecast episode, I declared that AirTags are a superior product to iPads. The iPad lovers roasted me across social media. I have heard and respect their opinions. But, I'm sorry - the second-gen AirTag has only deepened my conviction that the humble, $29 item tracker is one of Apple's most helpful […]

item.title: Apple could soon allow AI chatbots like ChatGPT and Gemini to appear on CarPlay
item.description: A new report suggests Apple is thinking about opening up CarPlay to more AI bots, though Siri won't be replaced.

item.title: NASA is sending Crew-12 astronauts to the ISS on February 11
item.description: The Crew-12 astronauts will soon make their way to the ISS, joining the three remaining spacefarers on board after the previous mission was cut short due to a medical concern. NASA was originally planning a February 15 launch date for the mission, but it has moved it up to February 11. It’s now targeting a liftoff of no earlier than 6:01 AM Eastern that day from Cape Canaveral in Florida. The crew members are already in quarantine, and if everything goes well on launch day, the Dragon capsule they’re on will dock with the orbiting lab at approximately 10:30 AM on February 12. If you’ll recall,...

item.title: La puce d’Intel pour les consoles portables prend du retard
item.description: Alors que sur le marché des consoles portables PC, Intel semble rencontrer un obstacle de taille. Les très attendues puces Panther Lake, censées propulser la prochaine génération de concurrentes au Steam Deck et à la ROG Ally, ne pointeraient pas le bout de leur nez avant le printemps 2026.

item.title: Crime 101 writer-director Bart Layton reveals his Mount Rushmore of crime genre movies: 'they're endlessly brilliant and rewatchable'
item.description: Bart Layton lifts the lid on his all-time favorite crime movies – and how they inspired his new Chris Hemsworth-starring film.

item.title: J’ai testé un SSD qui ne fonctionne pas sans mon smartphone
item.description: Lexar a lancé un disque dur compact qui ne fonctionne que si vous approchez votre téléphone pour le déverrouiller par NFC. Voici notre test complet du TouchLock Portable SSD.

item.title: Anker’s new charger with a screen would feel less gimmicky if it did more
item.description: The latest Anker 45-watt Nano charger, announced in January, which remains one of the smallest 45-watt chargers on the market, adds a full color screen displaying an animated character and a smattering of details about the device you're charging. The display is occasionally useful if you like to keep tabs on how much power your […]
